title: Women, drugs and alcohol
creator_credit: MTI Teleprograms, J. Gary Mitchell and John MacDonald
brief_description: Illustrates the realities of drugs and alcohol abuse among women, with a special emphasis on prescription drugs. Presents vital information on the nature and scope of the problem as seen by experts in the field of medicine, pharmacology and psychology. Explores the situation of the woman abuser through interviews and discussions. Narrated by Jessica Walter.
